text: The Virginian Railroad Class AG 2-6-6-6 was a class of 8 2-6-6-6 Type steam locomotives built in 1945 for the Virginian Railroad by Lima . All of them were designed to pull heavy loads of heavy freight trains but they donâ€™t really pull fast passenger trains on the railroad. They were scrapped in 1960
title: Virginian Railroad Class AG 2-6-6-6
